## INTERCEPT\_CLASS\_KEY variable

Metadata key for method-level interceptors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
INTERCEPT_CLASS_KEY: MetadataAccessor<GenericInterceptorOrKey<InvocationContext>[], ClassDecorator>
```
